Module schedual
Package schedual.model

Class Engagement

java.lang.Object
schedual.model.Engagement
public class Engagement extends Object
Engagement Class which holds a hybrid of Customer and Appointment Values for a custom report.
Author:
Ben Porter

  • Constructor Details

    • Engagement

      public Engagement(int Customer_ID, String Customer_Name, String Last_Appointment, String Next_Appointment)
      Default Constructor for Engagement
      Parameters:
      Customer_ID - The unique ID for the corresponding customer from the customers table.
      Customer_Name - String value indicating the name of the customer.
      Last_Appointment - String containing the Formatted DateTime of the Customer's Last Appointment.
      Next_Appointment - String containing the Formatted DateTime of the Customer's Next Appointment.
